thread.title: Phil Berry
thread.title_full: Saatchi Art reviewed by Phil Berry

author: Phil Berry
title: Phil Berry
text:
The whole experience was a seamless exercise. Some negotiating transpired but all was handled very equitably and professionally. A slight gasp as I realised the difference between US dollars and Aus dollars, but that is totally my ignorance and problem.
The items were very well packaged and arrived very quickly. Some slight variation to delivery, such as delaying shipping due to OS travel, were handled exceptionally well.
I wish my budget and wall space would allow further purchases.
